name: Disable Menu Links with Children
author: Angela Romana

sections.description:
The Disable Menu Links with Children plugin offers a simple solution to disable links for menu items that have children. With this plugin, you can enhance user experience and site accessibility by preventing clicks on menu items that act as dropdown toggles.

Key Features

  • Effortless Setup: Easily configure the plugin to disable links for menu items with children, improving site usability.

  • Enhanced Accessibility: By disabling links for menu items that expand into submenus, you ensure a more intuitive navigation experience for all users.

  • Streamlined Interface: The plugin seamlessly integrates into the WordPress menu management interface, providing a hassle-free user experience.

  • Customization Options: Customize the behavior of the plugin according to your site’s specific needs, ensuring optimal navigation functionality.

Protect your site’s usability and enhance accessibility by disabling menu links for items with children. The Disable Menu Links with Children plugin empowers you to provide a smoother navigation experience for your visitors.

Usage

  • No additional setup is required after activating the plugin.
  • Simply manage your menus as usual, and the plugin will handle the rest, disabling links for items with children.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the Disable Menu Links with Children plugin to your WordPress site.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. The plugin will automatically disable links for menu items with children.
